name: Giant Owl
languages: understands Common, Elvish, and Sylvan but can’t speak them

traits.name: Flyby
traits.description: The owl doesn’t provoke an Opportunity Attack when it flies out of an enemy’s reach.

actions.name: Talons
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The owl casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability:
At Will: Detect Evil and Good, Detect Magic
1/Day: Clairvoyance
